title: Some spells don't have outlines
body: My game doesn't show outlines of certain spells. For example, the vision plant doesn't have the blue outline, it's just a blue cloud in the shape of a triangle. Another one is Katarina's Q ability. When it hits the ground, it doesn't have the red circle outline of where it's going to hit when I shunpo to it. It only has a dagger stuck into the ground. Is there any way to fix this? Those are the only two I know of at the moment, but please tell me how to fix it.

replies.body: What are all of your **VIDEO** settings in-game set to? Some of them can disable or enable specific graphics interactions.
